name: Waning Forest
description:
Controls: Movement:

Arrow keys  (or)   click on a location

Interaction: 

Z/X   (or)  Left/Right mouse click

Description

Waning Forest follows a curious centaur on a quest to find out why the forest is waning, and how to help its rejuvination while meeting many creatures to hug along the way.

Credits:

Nessy : Developer

Septia : Co-Writer & Editor

Info

Made with RPG Maker MV

Waning Forest was made for the 'Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth' with the theme of 'Rejuvination' over the course of 4 weeks. Learned how to plan out a full story, if short and how to use RPG Maker MV<3
